data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Burhanpur are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Burhanpur, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Burhanpur, Madhya Pradesh, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Burhanpur who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, please give the 8,336 believers in the county of Burhanpur the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Rajput Agnivansi people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Rajput Agnivansi people know you.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Burhanpur. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Burhanpur access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary:
the county of Burhanpur, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 757,800.

We estimate Burhanpur has 8,336 people who might know Jesus, 9,195 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 740,270 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Burhanpur, Madhya Pradesh, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?
